description:
Experience SPORTS ILLUSTRATED on the HP Palm Pre.  

This app gives you the ability to purchase a monthly subscription to Sports Illustrated Magazine. And if you currently subscribe to SPORTS Illustrated magazine in print, you can access the HP digital edition FREE!  You can read and store as many digital issues as you’d like within the same app.

The Sports Illustrated Digital edition features everything you’ve come to expect from the Magazine plus the best of SI.com:

-Twice as many photos in exclusive galleries
-Feature stories enriched with slideshows and video
-Live scores and customized news feeds
-Original video essays, interviews and commentary
-Classic pieces by SI’s writers
-Social Media sharing of SI content on Facebook and Twitter 
-Read and store as many digital issues as you’d like within the app

By downloading this application, you agree to the End User License Agreement (including the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service referenced therein) which can be viewed by going to si.com/eula or clicking the “Support” button on this page.  Seller: TI Media Solutions Inc.
